direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve querying interest-related data for margin accounts.
Both methods access and retrieve data related to margin account operations.
Both methods query and retrieve data that affects the state of the margin account.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for querying interest rates.
Setting up the margin environment is necessary before querying interest rates.
Verifying the interest rate can help in asserting the correctness of the next hourly interest rate.
